title: Cumberland Gap National Historical Park: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Pets              Pets          Cumberland Gap National Historical Park is a pet friendly park! Pets are welcome but must be on a leash or in a carrier at all times while in the park.  Horses are allowed on designated trails and at the Hensley Camp, White Rocks, and Martin's Fork backcountry campsites.  For more information call (606) 248-2817.
